languages.text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.
languages.original_text: Офицеры воодушевляют союзников действовать на пределе возможностей. Их стиль игры состоит в повышении эффективности союзников и предоставлении им дополнительных возможностей.

traits.locale_text: Leaders inspire their teammates to perform at their best. A Leader's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.
Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.
Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

languages.text: Los oficiales inspiran a sus compañeros a dar lo mejor de sí mismos. Su estilo de juego consiste en mejorar la efectividad de sus aliados y ofrecerles más oportunidades de actuar.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: Los líderes inspiran a sus compañeros a dar lo mejor de sí mismos. Su estilo de juego consiste en mejorar la efectividad de sus aliados y ofrecerles más oportunidades de actuar.

languages.text: 军官擅长激励队友，让他们在战斗中更加强大。军官可以为队友提供各种加成，同时给予他们额外的行动机会。
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: 领袖擅长激励队友，让他们在战斗中更加强大。领袖可以为队友提供各种加成，同时给予他们额外的行动机会。

languages.text: 士官はチームメイトを鼓舞し、最高のパフォーマンスを発揮させる。味方の効果を向上させたり、味方にさまざまな追加行動のチャンスを与えることができる。
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: 士官はチームメイトを鼓舞し、最高のパフォーマンスを発揮させる。味方の効果を向上させたり、味方にさまざまな追加行動のチャンスを与えることができる。

languages.text: Offiziere spornen ihre Teamkameraden an, ihr Bestes zu geben. Der Spielstil eines Offiziers besteht darin, die Effektivität der Verbündeten zu verbessern und ihnen verschiedene zusätzliche Handlungsmöglichkeiten zu geben.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: Anführer spornen ihre Teamkameraden an, ihr Bestes zu geben. Der Spielstil eines Anführers besteht darin, die Effektivität der Verbündeten zu verbessern und ihnen verschiedene zusätzliche Handlungsmöglichkeiten zu geben.

languages.text: Les officiers poussent leurs coéquipiers à donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes. Le rôle d'un officier consiste à améliorer l'efficacité de ses alliés et à leur offrir des opportunités d'action supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: Les Leaders poussent leurs coéquipiers à donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes. Le style de jeu d'un Leader consiste à améliorer l'efficacité de ses alliés et à leur offrir des opportunités d'action supplémentaires.

Les Leaders poussent leurs coéquipiers à donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes. Le style de jeu d'un Leader consiste à améliorer l'efficacité de ses alliés et à leur offrir des opportunités d'action supplémentaires.

languages.text: Офицеры воодушевляют союзников действовать на пределе возможностей. Их стиль игры состоит в повышении эффективности союзников и предоставлении им дополнительных возможностей.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.

traits.locale_text: Лидеры воодушевляют союзников действовать на пределе возможностей. Их стиль игры состоит в повышении эффективности союзников и предоставлении им дополнительных возможностей.
Лидеры воодушевляют союзников действовать на пределе возможностей. Их стиль игры состоит в повышении эффективности союзников и предоставлении им дополнительных возможностей.

languages.text: Subay, takım arkadaşlarına ilham vererek ellerinden gelenin en iyisini ortaya koymalarını sağlar. Bir Subay'ın oyun tarzı, dost birimlerin etkililiğini artırmak ve onlara harekete geçmeleri için çeşitli ek fırsatlar sunmaktır.
languages.original_text: Officers inspire their teammates to perform at their best. An Officer's playstyle involves improving allies' effectiveness and providing them with various extra opportunities to act.
